content.query:
CREATE TABLE [pool_logdata]
(
[Correlation id] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operation name] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Event category] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] varchar(200) NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Event initiated by] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource type] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource group] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)

COPY INTO [pool_logdata] FROM 'https://dataworkspaceacntt.blob.core.windows.net/csv/Log.csv'
WITH 
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY='Storage Account Key',SECRET='wYtHYkTjcrlB1wC9Z4ElhLIri/TgVj3JMfz/p66Aqvjnifw+e/TBL0lQczLb3zIhKp42M1bPvR7f+AStjzKpvQ=='),
    FIRSTROW=2)

 SELECT * FROM [pool_logdata]

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'P@ssword@12345'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY ='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'
,SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwlax&se=2024-03-31T16:43:30Z&st=2024-03-11T08:43:30Z&spr=https&sig=voucpcWgZbZigfu8ETUFLnJ9wjSOty0QdieS9usjvBI%3D'
 
 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE log_data_parquet
WITH(LOCATION = 'https://dataworkspaceacntt.blob.core.windows.net/parquet',
                 CREDENTIAL = SasToken)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    )

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet]
(
[Correlationid] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operationname] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Eventcategory] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] varchar(100) NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcetype] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcegroup] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = '/log.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = log_data_parquet,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
)

select * from logdata_parquet

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL AzaureStorageCredential
WITH IDENTITY ='dataworkspaceacntt'
,SECRET='wYtHYkTjcrlB1wC9Z4ElhLIri/TgVj3JMfz/p66Aqvjnifw+e/TBL0lQczLb3zIhKp42M1bPvR7f+AStjzKpvQ=='

 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE log_data_csv
WITH(LOCATION = 'abfss://csv@dataworkspaceacntt.dfs.core.windows.net',
                 CREDENTIAL = AzaureStorageCredential,
                 TYPE = HADOOP)
 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
)

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata]
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata]
(
[Correlation id] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operation name] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Event category] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] varchar(200) NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Event initiated by] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource type] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource group] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = '/Log.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = log_data_csv,
	FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)

select * from [logdata]

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet]

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet]
(
[Correlationid] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operationname] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Eventcategory] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] varchar(100) NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcetype] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcegroup] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = '/',
	DATA_SOURCE = log_data_parquet,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
)

select * from logdata_parquet

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY ='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'
,SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwlax&se=2024-03-31T16:43:30Z&st=2024-03-11T08:43:30Z&spr=https&sig=voucpcWgZbZigfu8ETUFLnJ9wjSOty0QdieS9usjvBI%3D'
 
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE log_data_parquet
WITH(LOCATION = 'https://dataworkspaceacntt.blob.core.windows.net/parquet',
                 CREDENTIAL = SasToken)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    )

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet]

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet]
(
[Correlationid] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operationname] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Eventcategory] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] varchar(100) NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcetype] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resourcegroup] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = '/log.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = log_data_parquet,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
)

select * from logdata_parquet

CREATE DATABASE [appdb]

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'P@ssword@12345'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY ='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'
,SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwl&se=2024-03-11T14:35:45Z&st=2024-03-11T06:35:45Z&spr=https&sig=id6La4cWvEQ8X1vfWXv9cA2bAjOgPDGjmyuqFvieEEs%3D'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE log_data
WITH(LOCATION = 'https://dataworkspaceacntt.blob.core.windows.net/csv',
                 CREDENTIAL = SasToken)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT TextFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIELD_TERMINATOR=',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata]
(
[Correlation id] varchar(200) NULL,
[Operation name] varchar(200) NULL,
[Status] varchar(100) NULL,
[Event category] varchar(100) NULL,
[Level] varchar(100) NULL,
[Time] datetime NULL,
[Subscription] varchar(200) NULL,
[Event initiated by] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource type] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource group] varchar(1000) NULL,
[Resource] varchar(2000) NULL
)
WITH (
	LOCATION = '/Log.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = log_data,
	FILE_FORMAT = TextFileFormat
)

select * from [logdata]
